Meet the Styleguide.

Welcome to the Hyperaudio Styleguide. The purpouse of this styleguide is to document all, even tiniest, elements of Hyperaudioâ€™s user interface.

Styleguide requires Hyperaudio base stylesheet, hence all that works within the Styleguide will work on the site or any of the apps as well.

Modules documented in the Styleguide (especially components and combos) are build with flexibility in mind, hence they will adapt to the bounding box. For that it is important to keep the layout classes and presentational classes separated. More on that in the Grid section.

Dependecies.

Hyperaudio UI architecture depends principally on a few Node Modules used for CSS compilation and Bower which is used to handle dependencies.

Running the thing.

$ cd directory
$ npm install
$ bower install
$ gulp

Stylesheet architecture.

Whenever any style changes are required, enter project directory, follow instructions found above (Running the thing) and make necessary edits in the /src/styles directory. CSS files will automagically be compiled and minimized.

Keep the Styleguide clean, sweet and up-to-date.

And nobody will record you while you snore.
